statements: SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT card_number, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, cvv_code, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE card_number = '1234567890123456'
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE cvv_code = '123'
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT card_number, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM credit_card_transactions GROUP BY card_number HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC, transaction_date ASC LIMIT 15;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardTransactions
SELECT transaction_id, credit_card_number, transaction_amount FROM CreditCardTransactions WHERE cvv_code = '123'
SELECT transaction_id, credit_card_number, transaction_amount FROM CreditCardTransactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM AuthorizedTransactions
SELECT authorization_id, authorization_code, authorization_date FROM AuthorizedTransactions WHERE transaction_id = 1
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM CreditCardTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardTransactions WHERE cvv_code = '123' AND transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY credit_card_number ASC;
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM CreditCardTransactions;
SELECT authorization_id, authorization_code, authorization_date FROM AuthorizedTransactions WHERE authorization_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY authorization_date DESC;

SELECT * FROM AuthorizedTransactions JOIN CreditCardTransactions ON AuthorizedTransactions.transaction_id = CreditCardTransactions.transaction_id WHERE CreditCardTransactions.transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY AuthorizedTransactions.authorization_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT card_number, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM credit_card_transactions GROUP BY card_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT transaction_id, status, message FROM transactions_history WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT transaction_id, status, timestamp FROM transactions_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, address FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT card_number, expiry_date FROM CreditCards WHERE expiry_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%California%';
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, amount FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT card_number, expiry_date, cvv_code FROM CreditCards WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FraudTransactions WHERE reason = 'Fraudulent Activity' AND is_flagged = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT card_number, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, cvv_code FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM cards ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT card_number, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT users.username, cards.card_number FROM users JOIN cards ON users.user_id = cards.card_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT card_number FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 500;
